topics.body:
[bq]Patsworth prayed to the three, for this buss down huntress, to stop owning his ass like a clown.
To the Lame God he knelt, to Coward God he confessed, then praised the God of Backing Down.[/bq]
Say what you will about the Bloodborne LP. These couplets are hilarious.
